src:
Milijana (21) noseča, mož Milojko (74) pravi: »V šovu spi z vsemi«
Seveda pa tudi novice o nosečnosti še niso potrjene.
04 Nov 2019, 13:22 by T. K.



Milijana in Milojko se v resničnostnem šovu veliko in glasno prepirata, kar pa seveda gledanosti ne škoduje. FOTO: Youtube



Milijana in Milojko. FOTO: Youtube


Situacija v srbskem resničnostnem šovu Pari (Parovi) je vse bolj napeta. Saj se še spomnite Milijane (21) in Milojka Božića (74). Po poroki je njun zakon zašel v precej nemirne vode.
Vse za večjo gledanost
Odkar je par (znan v glavnem samo zaradi tega, ker je med njo in njim velikanska starostna razlika) vstopil v resničnostni šov, se je zanj začelo burno obdobje. Miljana je prevarala Milojka z Nemanjo Stamatovićem Žabcem, in to v njegovi neposredni bližini. Zdaj je slišati, da je noseča, ali gre zgolj za govorice, pa bo jasno kmalu (vsekakor pa čez devet mesecev). Milojko trdi, da mu je novico o Miljanini nosečnosti povedal Žabac, ta pa tega ni želel potrditi.


Milijana in Milojko. FOTO: Youtube
text:
Pregnant Milijana (21), husband Milojko (74) says, "Sleeps with everyone in the show"
Of course, the news of the pregnancy has not yet been confirmed.
04 Nov 2019, 13:22 by T.K.



Milijana and Milojko have a big and loud fight in the reality show, which of course does not hurt the viewership. PHOTO: Youtube



Milijana and Milojko. PHOTO: Youtube


The situation in the Serbian reality show Pari (Couples) is increasingly tense. You still remember Miliana (21) and Milojko Božić (74). After marriage, their marriage went into quite turbulent waters.
All for increased viewership
Ever since the couple (known mainly for being a huge age difference between her and him) entered the reality show, a tumultuous period has begun for him. Miljana cheated on Milojko with Nemanja Stamatovic the Frog in his immediate vicinity. Now it's rumored that she's pregnant, whether it's just rumors, but it will be clear soon (after all, in nine months). Milojko claims that Zabac told him the news about Miljana's pregnancy, but he did not want to confirm it.


Milijana and Milojko. PHOTO: Youtube
